title: Question:
author: John59031
content: We offer hashboard repair, host and construction.Hasboard repair for S19 , 19jpro and xp.Such as: pic , Asic and power supply.We can repair whole miner.We offer farm for 5c electricity cost include(host fee and tax)Location: USA

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: John59031 on February 13, 2023, 06:34:59 PMWe offer hashboard repair, host and construction.~Snipped~We can repair whole miner.What's the name of the company behind this so-called "anti-miner [this isn't an accurate representation of what you're trying to offer here]" service?Quote from: John59031 on February 13, 2023, 06:34:59 PMWe offer farm for 5c electricity cost include(host fee and tax)I don't think anybody will contact you without knowing who they're dealing with [e.g. website].

comments.author: ruber1
comments.body: Same Question basically, Who are you (Website) or other referral Info?
